channel.title: Version 1.0.2 on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: Project: shantz-wp-prefix-suffix Updated to 1.0.2
item.description: Many users reported errors while activating the version 1.0.1 of my WordPress plugin shantz-wp-prefix-suffix. I tracked it down to a typo that crept into the release somehow.
item.content: Many users reported errors while activating the version 1.0.1 of my WordPress plugin shantz-wp-prefix-suffix. I tracked it down to a typo that crept into the release somehow.
